ygData.subject: crawl limits
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it possible to limit the number of outgoing calls that Heritrix in terms of either number per second, or bandwidth. I can see how to do this per host, but

Is it possible to limit the number of outgoing calls that Heritrix in
terms of either number per second, or bandwidth. I can see how to do
this per host, but not for the whole crawl.

Phil
